directions: Stir the corn, onion, tomato, cucumber, mint, basil, Thai chile peppers, lime juice, and mayonnaise together in a bowl. Refrigerate overnight or 8 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 small roma (plum) tomato, seeded and chopped
2 Thai chile peppers, seeded and chopped
title: Summer Corn Dip
